path: artifacts/FlappyCake Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.FlappyCake: contracts/FlappyCake Full Smart Contract Security Audit/FlappyCake

findings.title: Centralization of owner privileges
findings.description: The contract provides excessive privileges to the owner, enabling them to alter critical settings and compromise the security and functionality of the contract.
findings.location: Various functions (dividendTracker, swapTokensAtAmount, fee exclusion, marketing/team/game wallets, buy/sell fees, max wallet mode/amount, automatedMarketMakerPairs array, blacklist, max wallet restrictions, gas processing, claimWait value, dividend exclusion, contract BNBs withdrawal)
